txt.en: Talk to Dinodas outside 8 Honeymead Lane
Talk to Bingo Boffin at Bâr Faroth
Find Marigold Boffin on the Old Links and put an end to the goblin-mischief
Talk to Berilac on the Old Links
Find Griffo Boffin
Talk to Griffo Boffin

'Hullo, hullo, [placeholder]! You're looking for cousin Prisca's children? Well, I've seen one! Young Fosco told me the party was delayed, and he intended to spy an Elf-boat or two on one of the western rivers. That's the direction you want to look.\n\n'I'll catch up with you after I'm done with my shopping. I'm in the market for some rope, you see. Can never have enough rope, when you're adventuring! I will see you later, friend!'

'Young Fosco told me the party was delayed, and he intended to spy an Elf-boat or two on one of the western rivers. That's the direction you want to look.\n\n'I'll catch up with you after I'm done with my shopping. I'm in the market for some rope, you see. Can never have enough rope, when you're adventuring! I will see you later, friend!'

'I went in search of Elf-boats, [placeholder]... but I found a hobbit-boat instead! It seems the Yonder-hobbits aren't as afraid of boating as the folk back home. Are these... are these my people?

'I bumped into my sister Marigold a short ways back, but she didn't come here with me. She said she was going to investigate the ruins to the north of here. That's very much like our Marigold, if you don't know. She's always looking for adventure. If you find goblins you'll likely find my sister!

'I have a few more questions for this fellow about his boat, but once I've asked them I'll come back for Angelica's party. Worry not! I won't be long.'

'I bumped into my sister Marigold a short ways back, but she didn't come here with me. She said she was going to investigate the ruins to the north of here. That's very much like our Marigold, if you don't know. She's always looking for adventure. If you find goblins you'll likely find my sister!\n\n'I have a few more questions for this fellow about his boat, but once I've asked them I'll come back for Angelica's party. Worry not! I won't be long.'

'No sign of Marigold yet? I'm sure she's fine: she's a chip off the old block, as they say! Of all my first-removed cousins, she seems most able to take care of herself. Prisca would say I have been a bad influence, but I say that's the very best kind!

'I think I might have found a clue to the location of another of the Boffin children, [placeholder]. There is apparently a dancing competition underway at Long Cleeve. If that does not sound like music to Esmeralda's ears, I know of nothing else that would!

'To Long Cleeve, my good [placeholder]!'

'I think I might have found a clue to the location of another of the Boffin children, [placeholder]. There is apparently a dancing competition underway at Long Cleeve. If that does not sound like music to Esmeralda's ears, I know of nothing else that would!\n\n'To Long Cleeve, my good [placeholder]!'

'Are you here to join in the dancing competition, [placeholder]? When I arrived, I discovered to my dismay that there was nothing going on! There was nary a toe-tap, no sign of an arm-flourish, neither a twirl nor a whirl! So I started my own.\n\n'I will return to Nobottle, of course. But not until you participate in the dance, [placeholder]!'
'I will return to Nobottle, of course. But not until you participate in the dance, [placeholder]!'
Fosco told you that Marigold headed north in the direction of Lhúngobel, seeking enemies to slay.
Fosco told you that Marigold headed north in the direction of Lhúngobel, seeking enemies to slay.
Bingo Boffin has followed you to Lhúngobel.
Bingo heard rumours of a dancing competition happening at Long Cleeve, and thinks that seems a likely place to find Esmeralda.
Esmeralda Boffin is dancing at Long Cleeve.
'DNT - Blah!'
'DNT - Blah!'
Esmeralda will not return to Nobottle until you perform in her dancing competition. You had better <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb>!
'Keep dancing, [placeholder]! Mix it up!'
Dinodas Boffin has ruined his sister Angelica's house-warming party (with your assistance), but now his mother Prisca demands that you help him set things right.
Esmeralda will not return to Nobottle until you perform in her dancing competition. You had better <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb>!
'DNT - Blah!'
Esmeralda Boffin is at Long Cleeve, dancing.
'You'll never get me alive!'
Esmeralda saw Marigold heading north in the direction of Bâr Faroth.
Nárnaz the Smiter encountered a deadly hobbit-adventurer at Bâr Faroth, to his sorrow.

'There's nothing for it, [placeholder]: we have to track down the rest of my siblings and get them to come back before my mother loses her temper. Trust me! She's a little cross at the moment, but you'll see much worse if we don't hurry!\n\n'You should check first with my cousin Bingo. He's something of an adventurer, it turns out, and might have seen where everyone went. I think he went back to Tighfield.'
'DNT - Blah!'
Talk to Bingo Boffin in Tighfield
'You should check first with my cousin Bingo. He's something of an adventurer, it turns out, and might have seen where everyone went. I think he went back to Tighfield.'
Find Fosco Boffin
'DNT - Blah!'
'DNT - Blah!'
Talk to Fosco Boffin by the riverside
'Will you look at that!'
Look for Marigold and defeat goblins at Lhúngobel ([placeholder]/6)
'DNT - Blah!'
Bingo Boffin has arrived at Bâr Faroth.
'DNT - Blah!'
Marigold Boffin went ahead to the Old Links to stop the planned goblin-mischief.
Bingo has arrived, wearing a concerned expression
'DNT - Blah!'
Berilac slept through the commotion on the Old Links.
'Mumble... who's stepping on me... mumble...'
'Hullo there!'
'Some of us... are sleeping... mumble...'
Berilac dreamed of a delicious smell wafting from Northcotton Farm, in the east: just the sort of odour to attract the attention of his hungry sibling Griffo.
'Five more... five more minutes... snore...'
'DNT - Blah!'
Griffo Boffin stands by a waggon bearing food from Northcotton Farm.
'DNT - Blah!'
Congratulations! You have accounted for each of the Boffin children!
'I will return to Nobottle.'
Now that you have found all of his brothers and sisters, you should return to Dinodas outside 8 Honeymead Lane, in Nobottle.
'DNT - Blah!'
'DNT - Blah!'
'Hullo there, [placeholder]! My brother Berilac is sleeping peacefully... but he doesn't know there are goblins about! We'd better protect him.'
'DNT - Blah!'
You are victorious!
'DNT - Blah!'
'Greetings!'
Griffo Boffin stands here, contentedly patting his stomach
Boffins On The Loose
How long must you <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb>?
Bingo is in Tighfield, and Dinodas believes he might have seen where the other Boffin children went.
Fosco Boffin apparently went in search of Elf-boats on the western rivers of Yondershire.
Esmeralda seems pleased with your performance
Fosco Boffin has found a hobbit-boat in one of the rivers of Yondershire.
A wounded goblin struggles here: Marigold's handiwork?

'Good job, [placeholder]! I am impressed!

'Anyway, you're looking for Marigold? She came this way and I asked if she wanted to join my dancing competition, but she declined. Apparently she was pursuing a band of goblins, although with my sister it can sometimes be hard to tell if what she says is true or if she's imagining some mad adventure. Either way, she ran off to the north, so you can look for her in that direction.

'I will return to Nobottle in a few moments. Let me just get a few more dance-steps in!'

'I never knew these folk to fight so fiercely before! Curse these Shire-folk!'

Nárnaz the Smiter coughs, the blood pooling beneath his torn armour.

'It won't matter, in the long run: the rest of my boys have already gone south-east, and they'll make the rules for a NEW sport! They're gonna repay those hobbits for the invention of Golfimbul-clubbing, you wait and see! This new sport will use the same clubs and can be played on the same fields... but the heads that roll won't belong to goblins! Ha ha ha!'
'That sounds bad, [placeholder]. We'd better hurry south-east! Marigold might have run into trouble on the Old Links!'

Berilac yawns and stretches sleepily.

'Ah, hello there, [placeholder]. I just had the most lovely and peaceful dream. There was a delicious smell wafting through Yondershire from the east. Actually, I can still smell it! What a convincing dream, to have left its imprint in this fashion!

'Now that I am rested, I will go see if Angelica's party is ready to begin. You're looking for Griffo? Perhaps you should follow the delicious smell of food... he probably would do so, if his nostrils detected it!'
Defeated goblins at Lhúngobel ([placeholder]/6)

'Now that I am rested, I will go see if Angelica's party is ready to begin. You're looking for Griffo? Perhaps you should follow the delicious smell of food to the east... he probably would do so, if his nostrils detected it!'

'Are you here to sample some food from Northcotton Farm? The waggon-driver kindly let me try some of the vegetables, and I am pleased to report that they are perfectly fresh and of the finest quality! Well, then I just had to try some of this fresh-baked bread, and there was a basket of apples just waiting to be sampled....\n\n'I suppose Angelica's party is nearly ready to begin? Then I will return to Nobottle, and perhaps when I get there I shall fill up my corners. My sister will surely have set out the snacks by then!'
You hear someone calling for you, but it isn't Marigold
'You did it: you found all my wayward brothers and sisters! You have my thanks, [placeholder].'
Sure enough, you have found Esmeralda Boffin mid-dance
There's nothing for it: you'll have to <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb>!
'You're here for the goblins? Don't wake Berilac!'
'Here they come again, but this time there's more of us!'
'That's all of them!'
I will return to Nobottle, but you can wake my brother Berilac!'
Perform your <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb> of choice
Perform another <rgb=#00FF00>dance</rgb>, or do the same one again... with feeling!
You have failed to safe-guard Yondershire!
Fosco Boffin stands by the riverside, marvelling at a hobbit-boat bobbing in the water
Talk to Esmeralda at Long Cleeve
Find Marigold Boffin at the ruins of Bâr Faroth
Fight alongside Marigold and Bingo
Talk to Nárnaz the Smiter near Bâr Faroth
'Capital idea, Marigold!'
Look for Marigold and defeat goblins at Lhúngobel (5/6)
Talk to Bingo Boffin at Lhúngobel
Find Esmeralda at the dancing competition at Long Cleeve
Talk to Esmeralda Boffin at Long Cleeve
